trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The FormsAuthenticationEventArgs class is used to supply event values to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event and to enable you to specify a custom identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: A classe FormsAuthenticationEventArgs é usada para fornecer valores de evento para o **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos e permitem que você especifique uma identidade personalizada para a solicitação atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> constructs a FormsAuthenticationEventArgs object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>constrói um objeto FormsAuthenticationEventArgs usando atual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>e o transmite para o **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>propriedade para definir o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>para um personalizado <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: Se você não especificar um valor para o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>propriedade durante o **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento, a identidade fornecida pelo tíquete de autenticação de formulários no cookie ou URL é usado.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: O **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento só é gerado quando a autenticação <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>é definido como <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>e o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>é um módulo HTTP ativado para o aplicativo.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the supplied `context` as the value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>constrói um <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>objeto usando fornecido `context` como o valor para o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: Ele passa a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>do objeto para o **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> objeto para a solicitação HTTP atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> provides access to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> objects for the current request.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>fornece acesso a <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>objetos para a solicitação atual.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> objeto para a solicitação HTTP atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object to be associated with the current request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objeto a ser associado à solicitação atual.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: You can use the User property to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar a propriedade do usuário para definir o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>para um personalizado <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the User property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: Se você não especificar um valor para a propriedade do usuário durante o **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento, a identidade fornecida pelo tíquete de autenticação de formulários no cookie ou URL é usada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object to be associated with the current request.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objeto a ser associado à solicitação atual.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>
